roleset.name: to move or proceed haltingly or unsteadily
roleset.note: LIMP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'limp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from limp.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: He and his successor , Mary Anne Dolan , restored respect for the editorial product , and though in recent years the paper had been limping along on limited resources , its accomplishments were notable .
